attributes.action: Save the Spirit of Soho - Make Soho a heritage site.
attributes.additional_details:
Soho is a unique village it is the Soul of London, it's vibrant character, nightlife and diversity has attracted tourists from all over the world.
It has a diverse creative community.

All Music venues are at risk, the plan is to have seated only venues in Soho within five years!
There will be nowhere for musicians and performers to play in Soho!
Madame Jojo's has recently closed.
Still going strong after 50 years Madame Jojo's is a symbolic loss, if that goes we fear the rest will follow!

How much of Soho will go this way in the next few years, where will this end?
Soho must be made a heritage site along with Denmark Street!

Something must be done to stop the unfair rise in rents which are driving out locals and independent business owners? Soon even the film companies won't even be able to afford to stay here!

If Soho loses it's artistic community it will surely lose it's soul.

Let's all help to do something positive to save the future of the Spirit of Soho!
